Prerequisite: Tiefling, paladin

Benefit: The target of your infernal wrath is also subject to your divine sanction. This divine sanction lasts until the start of your next turn.

Update (4/13/2010)

Replace the Benefit entry with the following entry. This update syncs up this text with the revision to infernal wrath.
